[Akson] Software Documentation¶

This is the official website for the documentation of Akson, a networked audiovisual environment that allows multi-user collaboration. Here you will find a detailed explanation of the software, the way it is done and how its features work. With examples documented from images and code, an extensive documentation is structured.
